welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Pablo Atlazalpan, a charming city known for its rich history and vibrant culture. We invite you to immerse yourself in our beautiful city and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The original and largest terminal at Internacional Benito Juarez Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Internacional Benito Juarez Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speeds and connectivity.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at General Mariano Matamoros Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
